definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: Clasping her pitcher to her waist mother went to fetch water from the village nearby.
sentences.chinese: 妈妈把她的水壶夹在腰间，去邻村汲水。

sentences.english: we came across this footbridge where these children were carrying flour.
sentences.chinese: 我们在过吊桥时遇到的汲水的孩子。

sentences.english: Clasping her pitcher to her waist mother went to fetch water from the village near by.
sentences.chinese: 妈妈把她的水罐挟在腰间，走到近村汲水去了。

sentences.english: The daughter of the village blacksmith, who was young and fair , stood at the well , drawing water.
sentences.chinese: 铁匠的那个年轻而美丽的女儿，正站在井边汲水。

definition: water intake/to obtain water (from a well etc)
to ladle water/to scoop up water
to pilot a ship/to channel water/to draw water (for irrigation)
to draw water for irrigation (manually or with a water wheel)
mouth of a spring or fountain
well sweep (device for raising and lowering a bucket in a well, using a pivoted pole)
